sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"组成，成分，部分"之意。
means: component ： 指一个整体的组成部分。
constituent ： 常可与component换用，指某一整体不可少的部分或成分。
element ： 指一个整体必不可少或固有的部分，强调一个复杂整体中最基本、最简单的元件、元素或成分等。
ingredient ： 普通用词，含义笼统。既可指混在一起而本身没有变化的物质，如配料，又可指与别的物质混在一起，发生了变化的成分。

word_mean: 成分，组元：组成成分或部分，神经学上尤指一系列神经元组成的功能系统，以传导躯体及内脏的传入或传出冲动
天体辐射源由几个部分组成时，每个组成部分的称谓。

sentence.Network_en: The menu is all-important. Every component of every meal should create contrasts.
sentence.Network_cn: 饭菜的安排至关重要。每一顿饭的每一道菜都应该有所不同。

sentence.Network_en: Polish workers will now be making component parts for Boeing 757s.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在波音757飞机的组成部件将由波兰工人制造。

sentence.Network_en: Gorbachev failed to keep the component parts of the Soviet Union together.
sentence.Network_cn: 戈尔巴乔夫没能把苏联各成员国团结在一起。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...ttp链接地址后面的四个参数：main restricted universe multiverse, Ubuntu把所有软件分为4类，称为“组件（component）”，以反映不同的许可证和可用的支, 持级别。缺省情况下，来自main的精选包会被安装以满足大多数计算机用户的基本要求，同.
元件架构设计，可以以升级或维护时抽换元件(Component)(DB, Data Source, Device Driver…Dcom)
成字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 成方，成方儿〖 setprescription〗 成分〖 component〗 成服〖 ready-madesuits〗.
机务英语基础 - 豆丁网 ... 存在 Exist 部件 Component 警告 Alarm.

list.abs: 部分机床设备英文翻译_百度文库 ... 辗压机 Rolling machines 液压元件 Hydraulic components 液压冲床 Presses,hydraulic.
在物理常用的英文单词_百度知道 ... reaction 反作用，反作用力 reactive component 抗性分量，无功分量 reactor 反应堆.
老猫测3C ... ... 电脑周边( Peripheral Device) 零组件( Component Device) 显示设备(  Display Device).
机械专业英语词汇（很全） - Lemon Tree ... 剖视图 profile chart 标准件 standard component 零件图 part drawing.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin component- 'putting together', from the verb componere, from com- 'together' + ponere 'put'. Compare with compound

encyclopedia.content: 简而言之，组件就是对象。C++ Builder中叫组件，Delphi中叫部件，而在Visual BASIC中叫控件。 组件是对数据和方法的简单封装。C++ Builder中，一个组件就是一个从TComponent派生出来的特定对象。组件可以有自己的属性和方法。属性是组件数据的简单访问者。方法则是组件的一些简单而可见的功能。 组件是C++ Builder环境中最令人激动的部分。使用组件可以实现拖放式编程、快速的属性处理以及真正的面向对象的设计。VCL和CLX组件是C++ Builder系统的核心。

entry.def: The components of something are the parts that it is made of.

example.ex: Enriched uranium is a key component of a nuclear weapon...
example.tran: 浓缩铀是核武器的关键组成部分。

example.ex: The management plan has four main components...
example.tran: 管理计划有4个主要部分。

entry.def: The component parts of something are the parts that make it up.

example.ex: Gorbachev failed to keep the component parts of the Soviet Union together...
example.tran: 戈尔巴乔夫没能把苏联各成员国团结在一起。

example.ex: Polish workers will now be making component parts for Boeing 757s.
example.tran: 现在波音757飞机的组成部件将由波兰工人制造。

sentences.sentence: "jealousy was a component of his character"
"two constituents of a musical composition are melody and harmony"
"humor: an effective ingredient of a speech"

means.word_mean: 2. something determined in relation to something that includes it;

sentences.sentence: "he wanted to feel a part of something bigger than himself"
"I read a portion of the manuscript"
"the smaller component is hard to reach"

means.word_mean: 3. an artifact that is one of the individual parts of which a composite entity is made up; especially a part that can be separated from or attached to a system;

sentences.sentence: "a component or constituent element of a system"

auth_sentence.content: We have a component of improved hygiene and sanitation.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have a component of improved hygiene and sanitation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have a component of improved hygiene and sanitation.

auth_sentence.content: Hillary herself identifies a cultural component of her difficulties.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hillary herself identifies a cultural component of her difficulties.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hillary herself identifies a cultural component of her difficulties.

auth_sentence.content: Each component is assessed based on its ecotoxicological impact.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each component is assessed based on its ecotoxicological impact.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each component is assessed based on its ecotoxicological impact.

stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+pon放+ent……的→放到一起[的东西]→成分
com共同+pon放+ent……的→放到一起[的东西]→成分
ex出+pon放置+ent人→把内容放出来的人→说明者
op反+pon放置+ent人→n.对手,反对者,敌手
propone[v.提议,建议,陈述]+ent人→n.提议者,支持者,拥护者
pro向前+pon放置+e→把[意见]向前放→提议

Sentence.sentence: The latest congressional report acknowledges the critical importance of technical training, but also asserts that the study of the humanities (人文学科)and social sciences must remain central components of America's educational system at all levels.
Strength training is another important component of physical activity.

In the modem industrialised agricultural process—which developing nations are moving towards in order to increase future yields—energy usage in the making and application of fertilisers and pesticides represents the single biggest component.

That notion is not concrete enough and it blurs two key components of hope,' Doctor Snyder said, 'Having hope means believing you have both the will and the way to accomplish your goals, whatever they may be.

means.word_mean: 成分, 组成部分, 部件, 元件

sentences.en: A chemist can separate a medicine into its components.
sentences.cn: 化学家能把一种药物的各种成分分解出来。

jushi.english: The army is the chief component of state power.
jushi.chinese: 军队是国力的重要组成部分。

jushi.english: This is a factory supplying components for the car industry.
jushi.chinese: 这是一间为汽车制造业提供零件的工厂。

jushi.english: A chemist can separate a medicine into its components.
jushi.chinese: 化学家能把一种药物的各种成分分解出来。
